## About

I am pursuing a PhD at the [Department of Computer Science](https://www.dcc.fc.up.pt/site/) of the [University of Porto](https://up.pt) where I am advised by [Mário Florido](https://sigarra.up.pt/fcup/pt/func_geral.formview?p_codigo=238703).

My research interests are centered around the design and implementation of programming languages. I am interested in the study of type systems, semantics, and logic.

<!-- Before my PhD, I obtained a MSc degree in Computer Science with a focus on Reliable Computation at the University of Porto. -->

:::
